name: The Dreadnoughts
description: '''The Dreadnoughts''' are a [[Canadian]] 6-piece [[folk punk]] band from [[Vancouver]]. The band combines a wide range of [[List of European folk music traditions|European folk music]] with modern [[street punk]].  The band has seven full-length albums and three EPs on various labels, and has played around 500 shows in around 30 countries. They also used to perform before 2020 as a traditional polka band at polka festivals, under the name "Polka Time!". Their performance peak was in 2010, when 180 shows were played.
